item.title: [Part 3 - Code] Inventory Management: The Art of Balancing Supply and Demand
item.description: In the previous post, we built a complete mathematical model to determine the optimal (s, S) policy for multiple items over a planning horizon. Now it’s time to put theory into practice. In this post, we generate realistic synthetic data, formulate the model in Python using PulP, solve it with an open-source solver, and visualize the results. By the end, you’ll see how the optimal reorder points and order-up-to levels unfold week by week.
